about_the_game:
An employee arrives for his night shift at the motel. Tonight will be his final night at this job. His cheerful colleague, Sarah, goes home for the night and he is left alone. His final night seems just as boring as any other at the motel. As always, it is an empty, forgotten place. The man is performing his usual duties, when he suddenly starts to see disturbing, blood-curdling visions. When a strange and scary visitor appears in the forgotten motel, the man’s final night shift turns into a nightmarish fight for his life.
Last Night Shift is a first-person horror game that creates a spooky atmosphere and tension. The game has a walking simulator and psychological horror genre elements. The action develops quite quickly and engages players from the beginning. Players solve mild puzzles, search for hidden items and complete various objectives.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains elements of violence, blood and horror themes. This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages.

name: Last Night Shift

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit Operating System
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce 760 or AMD HD 8800 or higher with 4GB of RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Last Night Shift is a first-person horror game that creates a spooky atmosphere and tension. An ordinary night shift at a motel turns into a living nightmare.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
